overview:
Alex Aminian has been President and Chief Executive Officer of DAVID Corporation since March 2006. He is responsible for DAVIDâ€™s corporate vision and its strategic direction, as well as for its growth and profitability, its product architecture, and day-to-day operation. Alex is focused on growing the business through increasing client satisfaction, enhancing the technology platform, providing sales and marketing leadership, and identifying new strategies that yield greater market penetration and client value.

Alex has more than 25 years of experience building and leading world-class organizations and developing enterprise software solutions for Fortune 1000 companies. Heâ€™s grown businesses organically and through strategic M&A, strengthening client relationships, building top-performing teams, architecting scalable state-of-the-art systems, developing product and technology visions and successfully commercializing them, and identifying new market opportunities.
